name: ${localWorkspaceFolderBasename} - Claude Code Sandbox
initializeCommand: bash -c 'printf "PROJECT_DIR=%q\n" "${localWorkspaceFolder}" >> .env; if [[ -f ./init-project.sh ]]; then ./init-project.sh; elif command -v ai-sbx-init-project >/dev/null 2>&1; then ai-sbx-init-project "${localWorkspaceFolder}"; fi'
